title: France panorama. [No. 73/24]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Homage to Picasso - the May salon. The Exhibition-Train - the Paris-Rouen-Orleans Forum-train. 2. The sun and concorde - 001 a flying laboratory. 3. The Goncourt president - Herve Bazin. 4. The arts: Camille Bryen - exhibition at the Museum of Modern Art. Miro - tapestries.
